title: Run a Conflicts Check
description: Before taking on a new client, a paralegal must run a conflicts check to ensure the firm can ethically represent them.

tasks.description: Receive the names of the potential new client and all adverse parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the list of all entities to be checked.

tasks.description: Search the firm's client and matter database for each name provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries the database for any matches against current or former clients.

tasks.description: Analyze the results for any direct or positional conflicts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the firm previously represented one of the adverse parties in an unrelated matter.

tasks.description: Generate a conflicts report summarizing the findings for the responsible attorney to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear report detailing the potential conflict.
